song_name: This Is Halloween - The Nightmare Before Christmas
metrics_conclusion: This Is Halloween - The Nightmare Before Christmas has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity and Melodic Complexity.
key_conclusion: This Is Halloween - The Nightmare Before Christmas has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Minor, G♯ Minor, C♯ Minor,  and G Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
